name: Jason's basics in Education and Learning
name_original: Jason's basics in Education and Learning
description:
this game is the same as Baldi's Basics but is my version on scratch. ( ･ω･)

⬅➡⬆⬇ to move
Press the R button for running
Press the SPACE button to interact
NOOB: you
reset the page / if it crash.
this game is a bit glitchy
